markdown:
* قام العالم الفرنسي باسكال بصياغة هذه النتيجة كما يلي : <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.473,t=0.076,r=0.933,b=0.106), with ID 7b2c8907-864c-41ee-951e-9f1890136403 -->

قاعدة (مبدأ) باسكال

عندما يؤثر ضغط على سائل محبوس في إناء فإن ذلك الضغط ينتقل بتمامه إلى جميع أجزاء السائل كما ينتقل إلى جدران الإناء. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.084,t=0.110,r=0.930,b=0.191), with ID af7b1ad7-49cc-4518-b800-978a46349898 -->

ملاحظة

* تخضع السوائل لقاعدة باسكال بينما لا تخضع الغازات لها،
لأن السوائل غيرقابلة للانضغاط فينتقل الضغط المؤثر عليها بتمامه إلى جميع أجزاء السائل. أما الغازات قابلة للانضغاط لوجود مسافات بينية كبيرة نسبياً بين جزيئات الغاز فيستهلك جزء من الشغل المبذول لضغط جزيئات الغازوبالتالي ينتقل الضغط جزئياً خلال الغازات. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.081,t=0.206,r=0.929,b=0.346), with ID 52b5d17f-fef2-43a9-a7fb-c399ef5f890f -->

تطبيقات على قاعدة باسكال <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.646,t=0.365,r=0.934,b=0.399), with ID 12a8dbe5-bdb0-4de2-8a10-cf5e15a37b0b -->

Summary : This image presents three examples of hydraulic systems and their applications, each illustrated with a photo and labeled in Arabic.

photo:
# Scene Overview :
  • Three circular photos, each showing a different hydraulic system in use.
  • Each photo is numbered (1, 2, 3) and accompanied by a descriptive Arabic label.
  • The background is white, and the layout is horizontal, with each example separated by dotted lines.

# Technical Details :
  • No scale bars or magnification.
  • All images are clear, with the main subject centered in each circle.
  • Arabic text is used for all labels and descriptions.

# Spatial Relationships :
  • Leftmost (1): Shows a construction vehicle with a hydraulic piston in use, labeled "المكبس الهيدروليكي" (the hydraulic piston).
  • Center (2): Shows a car brake disc and caliper, labeled "الفرامل الهيدروليكية للسيارة" (the hydraulic brakes for the car).
  • Rightmost (3): Shows a hydraulic crane lifting an object, labeled "الرافعة الهيدروليكية" (the hydraulic crane).

# Analysis :
  • The figure visually compares three common applications of hydraulic systems: pistons in heavy machinery, automotive brakes, and cranes.
  • The arrangement and numbering suggest a sequence or categorization of hydraulic uses, possibly from most basic (piston) to more complex (crane).
  • The use of clear, real-world photos helps illustrate the diversity of hydraulic technology in different industries. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.423,t=0.407,r=0.929,b=0.589), with ID 0a68330b-f9f0-4811-80de-23e6c98c18b2 -->

Summary : This image shows a dental clinic setting, specifically focusing on a dentist's chair and associated equipment.

photo:
Scene Overview :
  • Main subject is a modern dentist's chair with attached dental equipment.
  • The chair is positioned centrally, with a green cushioned seat and backrest.
  • Two matching green stools are present, one on each side of the chair.
  • The background shows a clinical environment with tiled or paneled walls and dental apparatus.
  • Lighting appears to be bright and clinical, typical of a dental office.

Technical Details :
  • No visible scale bar or magnification.
  • Arabic text below the image reads: "كرسي طبيب الأسنان" (translation: "Dentist's chair").
  • The image is circularly cropped and labeled with the number "4" at the top.

Spatial Relationships :
  • The dentist's chair is in the foreground, with stools and equipment arranged around it.
  • Dental tools and a monitor are visible behind and to the side of the chair.

Analysis :
  • The image visually communicates the typical setup of a dental treatment area, emphasizing the central role of the dentist's chair and its accessibility to both patient and practitioner. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.249,t=0.407,r=0.429,b=0.588), with ID 198efee5-cadb-4f73-b703-83320a6a59b5 -->

Summary : This is a photograph showing the arm and bucket of a hydraulic excavator, with Arabic text labeling the machine.

photo:
Scene Overview :
  • Main subject is the arm and bucket of a large yellow hydraulic excavator.
  • The excavator is photographed from a low angle against a blue sky with scattered clouds.
  • The composition places the excavator arm diagonally across the image, emphasizing its mechanical structure.
  • The color palette is dominated by yellow (machine) and blue (sky).

Technical Details :
  • No scale bar or magnification is present.
  • Arabic text below the image reads: "الحفار الهيدروليكي" (translation: "hydraulic excavator").
  • A red circle with the number "5" is positioned above the image, possibly indicating a step or item number.

Spatial Relationships :
  • The excavator arm and bucket are in the foreground, with the sky as the background.
  • The arm extends from the upper left toward the lower right, occupying most of the frame.

Analysis :
  • The image visually highlights the mechanical design and function of a hydraulic excavator, likely for educational or reference purposes. The clear sky background ensures the machinery is the focal point. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.085,t=0.411,r=0.261,b=0.586), with ID 45d00a9c-2775-421f-baa1-ff4753847d56 -->

وفيما يلي ستتعرض بشيء من التفصيل للمكبس الهيدروليكي. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.451,t=0.605,r=0.936,b=0.634), with ID b889b855-f66b-4869-b733-9cbe930887a1 -->

المكبس الهيدروليكى Hydraulic press <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.544,t=0.641,r=0.936,b=0.672), with ID 511636ce-dc6b-4751-8d90-c852dd7e28d1 -->

flowchart: 
- U-shaped tube with two pistons: left piston (large area), right piston (small area), both labeled "A" and "a" respectively, filled with hydraulic fluid.
- Labels: "السائل الهيدروليكي" (hydraulic fluid), "A", "a".

A U-shaped tube with two pistons, one with a small cross-sectional area (a) and the other with a large cross-sectional area (A). The space between the two pistons is filled with a suitable fluid (hydraulic fluid) as shown in the figure.

التركيب  
أنبوبة موصلة بمكبسَين أحدهما صغير مساحة مقطعه a والآخر كبير مساحة مقطعه A ويمتلئ الحيز بين المكبسين بسائل مناسب (سائل هيدروليكي) كما بالشكل.

الوظيفة  
الحصول على قوة كبيرة تؤثر على المكبس الكبير باستخدام قوة صغيرة تؤثر على المكبس الصغير.

فكرة العمل  
قاعدة باسكال. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.095,t=0.668,r=0.931,b=0.914), with ID d66a6476-0079-47fe-b6cc-e85f43db8248 -->

$10.3$ <!-- marginalia, from page 0 (l=0.091,t=0.942,r=0.128,b=0.959), with ID ff1a9ec6-3dcc-422a-add8-e5369a0490d0 -->
